name: iconographic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or involving iconography (= the use of images and symbols to represent ideas, especially by a religious or political group, or an artist): In 1985, Andy Warhol celebrated the iconographic status of the product through a series of screen prints. Her portrait is an iconographic image of the Great Depression.
More examplesFewer examplesAn important iconographic feature in the religion was a large key, which was needed to unlock the gates of heaven.As in the iconographic hippie film "Easy Rider", this work makes frequent reference to India and Buddhism.
